about_the_game:
Set the tone for your present-day RPGs with this versatile pack!

The Modern Day Music Mega-Pack from composer Joel Steudler covers contemporary action, ambiance, and emotion with a wide-ranging playlist spanning many genres.

This pack contains:
  • 25 BGM tracks, 25 Music Events (MEs), and 25 Sound Effects (SFX)
  • Rock, metal, pop, hip hop, electronica, blues and other genres
  • Music for battles, cities, dark alleys, underground tunnels, and the characters that will populate your game
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG/IG Maker projects
  • Bonus Modern Juice Bar/Beach Tiles by Lunarea

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
